text: Jaakko Lepola (born 14 March 1990) is a Finnish football player currently playing for KäPa on loan from IF Gnistan. ==Career== After his contract with FC Honka expired after the 2011 season, he signed a 1+1 year contract with FC Lahti Lepola signs for Lahti On 29 May 2019, Lepola was loaned out from IF Gnistan to KäPa.Otteluennakko: Gnistan matkaa Pallo-Iirojen vieraaksi Raumalle, gnistan.fi, 29 May 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Guardian Football * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish footballers Category:FC Honka players Category:FC Lahti players Category:IF Gnistan players Category:FC Espoo players Category:HIFK Fotboll players Category:Käpylän Pallo players Category:Kakkonen players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Jaakko Lepola
